last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: The police seize Hyuk, Jun and Je-hun, along with papers implicating Byun Gang-su. The company undergoes radical changes under new leadership.

name: Revolutionary Love
overview: Byun Hyuk is the younger son of a rich conglomerate family who was born with a silver spoon in his mouth. The lack of difficulties in life contributed to the carefree and hopelessly positive mindset of his. One day, he meets a girl who is everything that he is not. This drama is a depiction of youth where they learn about love and friendship.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A third-generation chaebol falls in love with a woman who opens his eyes to the struggles of the working class and inspires him to make a difference.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Drunk and broken-hearted, Byun Hyuk gets into a scandalous accident on a plane. Baek Jun is accused of stealing while on duty at a luxury hotel.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: When the footage of the plane incident goes public, Hyuk is in the hot seat. He tries to make things right, only to have his father squash his efforts.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: While police search for Hyuk, Jun steps in to smuggle him out to safety. She gets him a job, but the rich boy can't seem to stay out of trouble.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Hyuk turns himself in to the police, unaware of the work he's undoing. Upon release, he's kicked out of the house stripped of clothes and resources.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Hyuk follows Jun on her way to work one morning and ends up joining her cleaning crew. Their first assignment takes them to Gangsu Group's headquarters.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Jun overhears a conversation that may shatter Hyuk's trust in his brother. Kwon Je-hun is entrusted to organize a product launching event.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Upon his father's request, Hyuk considers applying for an internship at Gangsu. Threatened by the idea, Byun Wu-seong tries to talk him out of it.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Mr. Jang moves Hyuk to find a win-win solution to end Gangsu's exploitation of small factories. Meanwhile, Je-hun steps in to nip the case in the bud.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Despite near-impossible hurdles, Hyuk and Jun's rice bowls find success in a niche market. But those with the bigger slice don't want to share.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: A shocking revelation concerning Jun's father causes her to fall off the radar. Hyuk finally sees the lengths his brother is willing to go to win.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Kim Gi-seob has a rough first few days in the office, but Jun's crew steps in to back him up. Hyuk attends a series of boozy offsite meetings.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Facing accusations from his brother, Hyuk has three days to prove his innocence. To get a hold of hard evidence, Jun recruits an unlikely spy.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Jun quits her job to find what she wants to do. Hyuk looks into a company named BS. Wu-seong suspects that Je-hun has turned.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Je-hun plans a day full of activities from Jun's bucket list. What she doesn't know is that this is his way of saying goodbye.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Gangsu Group retaliates against corruption charges by firing their employees. But the groundwork's already been laid for a "byunhyuk": a revolution.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: The police seize Hyuk, Jun and Je-hun, along with papers implicating Byun Gang-su. The company undergoes radical changes under new leadership.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: A third-generation chaebol falls in love with a woman who opens his eyes to the struggles of the working class and inspires him to make a difference.
